documentation.text:
@notice get totalSupply of thesis Token
 @return uint256 totalSupply

@notice get totalSupply of thesis Token
 @return uint256 totalSupply

params.owner: : address of owner of the tokens to spend
params.spender: : address a spender should be allowed to spend owners tokens

returns._0: uint256 allowoance amount of tokens for a spender of the owners funds

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: triggers Transfer event, used in ThesisSwap

allowance(address,address).notice: get the allowance of an owner for a specific spender

approve(address,uint256).notice: here a sender approve the transfer of thesis tokens (used for handling in ThesisSwap)

transfer(address,uint256).notice: here Thesis token will be transfered from sender to receiver

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: here Thesis token will be transfered from sender to receiver, transfer needs to be approved

userdoc.notice: This contract is implemented for a thesis, custom token used in ThesisSwap contract
